text: Ceroplesis ferrugator is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Johan Christian Fabricius in 1787. It is known from Mozambique, Botswana, South Africa, Namibia, and Zimbabwe.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis ferrugator. Retrieved 8 September 2014. It contains the variety Ceroplesis ferrugator var. marginalis. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1787
title: Ceroplesis ferrugator
